channel.title: The Australian Home Loan, Mortgage and Property Podcast
channel.description: Mortgage Broker Capital West presents a series of podcasts covering a wide range of individual home loan products available in the Australian market, as well as information related to buying and selling property.
channel.itunes:author: Capital West
channel.itunes:subtitle: Capital West presents a series of podcasts focussing on home loan products, and issues relating to the buying and selling of property in Australia.
channel.itunes:summary: Mortgage Broker Capital West presents a series of podcasts covering a wide range of individual home loan products available in the Australian market, as well as information related to buying and selling property.

item.title: Reverse Mortgages
item.description: More Australians are set to retire over the next two decades than at any other time in our history. Whilst equity release products have been available in the United Kingdon and America for several decades now, these products have only been available in the Australian market since about 2004. Capital West discusses reverse mortgages with the Over Fifty Group, a company which for the last 30 years or so, has been providing services to Australian seniors.
item.itunes:author: Capital West
item.itunes:subtitle: Capital West discusses reverse mortgages with the Over Fifity Group.
item.itunes:summary: More Australians are set to retire over the next two decades than at any other time in our history. Whilst equity release products have been available in the United Kingdon and America for several decades now, these products have only been available in the Australian market since about 2004.
